# drp-progressive-image

A medium.com featured image display, which transitions from a thumbnail to an image display.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property                 | Attribute                 | Description                                                        | Type     | Default     |
| ------------------------ | ------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------- | ----------- |
| `height`                 | `height`                  | Height of the container surrounding the image.                     | `string` | `undefined` |
| `imageSrc`               | `image-src`               | Source of the image.                                               | `string` | `undefined` |
| `thumbnailSrc`           | `thumbnail-src`           | Source of the thumbnail image.                                     | `string` | `undefined` |
| `transitionMilliseconds` | `transition-milliseconds` | Transition time between when the image is loaded and is displayed. | `number` | `500`       |
| `width`                  | `width`                   | Width of the container surrounding the image.                      | `string` | `undefined` |
